title: Beyonce - Halo(2008) [x264-MP3][DVDRip] [mattlb0619]
description:
Work

I get the song is called Halo but the 'halo effect' in the video IMO was
overdone. I adjusted brightness/contrast to clear it up. IMO it is 
much better than the original. Check out thevideo to see 
what i mean. I added a touch of saturation, yadif deinterlace and cropped.
